alert.note: Alert for Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 29 at 8:51PM EDT until August 01 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, Breathitt, Lee, Owsley and Perry. * WHEN...Until 900 AM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 848 PM EDT, local law enforcement reported that some roads continue to be impacted by high water in the warned area due to on-going flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hazard, Jackson, Beattyville, Booneville, Simpson, Vicco, Buckhorn, Copland, Little, Howard Creek, Saldee, Haddix, Lost Creek, Whick, Curt, Watts, Clayhole, Flintville, Wolf Coal and Dumont.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
